ygData.subject: Re: Lullaby tip now Hymn stuff
ygData.msgSnippet: ... We finally got the hold message to not come up again so as to make it appear that both bards where healing everybody in the group. But after much
ygData.messageBody:
>There was some other discussion about getting Hymn to stack
>with another bard whose Hymn healed a different amount. I
>still haven't heard if anyone has tested any of the theories
>we came up with about this.
>
>--
>John H. Kim
>kim@...
>

We finally got the hold message to not come up again so as to make it
appear that both bards where healing everybody in the group. But after much
discussion, it was just some sort of wierd server lag, cause we where not
getting 2x the amount of healing. After playing with the lute of the gypsy
princess, im pretty sure its only a quest item and not even the quest to
get the electrum wak thingee cause there is another quest to get that (and
it is entirely self contained in mistmoore). Also, at lvl 42 we should be
healing 20 pts per tick if im correct, i always thought that number was
standing, but its sitting it seems.
